definition: a place for shooting (firing or driving) projectiles of various kinds, assign a rank or rating to
details:
noun
- a place for shooting (firing or driving) projectiles of various kinds
= example: a place for shooting (firing or driving) projectiles of various kinds
- a kitchen appliance used for cooking food
= synonyms: stove, cooking stove
- an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: 'the range of a supersonic jet'
= example: an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: 'the range of a supersonic jet'
= synonyms: reach
- the limit of capability
= synonyms: reach
- (mathematics) the set of values of the dependent variable for which a function is defined
= synonyms: image
- a variety of different things or activities
= example: a variety of different things or activities
- the limits within which something can be effective
= example: the limits within which something can be effective
= synonyms: reach
- a large tract of grassy open land on which livestock can graze
= example: a large tract of grassy open land on which livestock can graze
- a series of hills or mountains
= example: a series of hills or mountains
= synonyms: chain
verb
- assign a rank or rating to
= synonyms: place
- let eat
= example: let eat
- lay out orderly or logically in a line or as if in a line
= synonyms: array
- feed as in a meadow or pasture
= synonyms: graze
- move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment
= synonyms: cast
- range or extend over
= synonyms: straddle
- change or be different within limits
= example: change or be different within limits
= synonyms: run
- have a range
